modName: Smaug's Lair- A Standalone Dragon NPC
summary: Adds a standalone dragon named Smaug into the world with a lair and a treasure hoard.
descriptionHtml:
[b][img]http://i.imgur.com/1z5F8On.jpg[/img]


Just a note, I am getting reports of a bug where Smaug turning pink. I am not working on this at the moment, but it may br a compatibility issue with another mod or something. I am not sure what causes this.

Just updated with a standalone dragon named Smaug and a small lair! I am currently working on adding a Dwarven hall and Laketown. 

[/b]This mod no longer replaces Alduin (Though that is an optional file), but instead adds Smaug as a standalone dragon NPC with hefty loot for the taking in his lair. That is if you manage to kill him!

Future Plans:

-Custom Voice
-The Misty Mountains playing during battle
-Better Textures
-Laketown
Dwarven Hall (Like Erabor)


Please endorse :) 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-Schallen
